DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to monitor by microdialysis the postoperative outcomes in order to identify anastomotic leaks after rectal surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Monitoring by Microdialysis of Postoperative Complications After Proctectomy
DOC.criteria: rectal disease requiring proctectomy with anastomosis and stomy proctectomy by laparoscopy or laparotomy written consent history of colorectal surgery rectal surgery without anastomosis breastfeeding or pregnancy ASA score IV
